unnormalised: ## Bollywood Bites: Who's Dating Who (and Who's Wearing What Birkin!)
normalised: ## Bollywood Bites: Who's Dating Who (and Who's Wearing What Birkin!)

unnormalised: Namaste, my gossipy gharanas! Your weekly dose of Bollywood buzz is here, hotter than a plate of Hyderabadi biryani on a summer afternoon in Delhi. Forget climate change; the real heat's in the rumour mills!
normalised: Namaste, my gossipy gharanas! Your weekly dose of Bollywood buzz is here, hotter than a plate of Hyderabadi biryani on a summer afternoon in Delhi. Forget climate change; the real heat's in the rumour mills!

unnormalised: First up, the saga of Ranbir "RK" Kapoor Jr. and Ananya "Sparkle" Shetty. Sources close to the situation (read: my cousin's building security guard) claim they were spotted having coffee at Cafe Leopold. Coffee, you say? Or a secret rendezvous disguised as a caffeine fix? We're thinking the latter. Remember how RK denied dating Katrina Kaif for like, ages? History repeats itself, folks. Stay tuned, this one’s gonna simmer longer than a perfectly cooked Onam Sadhya!
normalised: First up, the saga of Ranbir "R K" Kapoor Junior and Ananya "Sparkle" Shetty. Sources close to the situation (read: my cousin's building security guard) claim they were spotted having coffee at Cafe Leopold. Coffee, you say? Or a secret rendezvous disguised as a caffeine fix? We're thinking the latter. Remember how R K denied dating Katrina Kaif for like, ages? History repeats itself, folks. Stay tuned, this one’s gonna simmer longer than a perfectly cooked Onam Sadhya!

unnormalised: Speaking of Onam, did you see Deepika Padukone's kasavu saree at the Ambani bash? Absolutely stunning! Though, rumour has it, she almost tripped on the train and poor Ranveer nearly had a heart attack. Fashion is pain, darling, but hopefully not literally.
normalised: Speaking of Onam, did you see Deepika Padukone's kasavu saree at the Ambani bash? Absolutely stunning! Though, rumour has it, she almost tripped on the train and poor Ranveer nearly had a heart attack. Fashion is pain, darling, but hopefully not literally.

unnormalised: Next, the always-reliable (not) "insider" source tells us that Karan Johar is planning another season of Koffee with Karan. Apparently, he’s demanding that guests reveal their actual monthly expenses. Imagine! 500 Rs. for chai? 5000 Rs. for face masks? The nation wants to know! (Probably not, but still.)
normalised: Next, the always-reliable (not) "insider" source tells us that Karan Johar is planning another season of Koffee with Karan. Apparently, he’s demanding that guests reveal their actual monthly expenses. Imagine! five hundred rupees for chai? five thousand rupees for face masks? The nation wants to know! (Probably not, but still.)

unnormalised: And last but not least, speculation is RIFE about whether Alia Bhatt is pregnant again. A slightly looser kurta at a recent film screening? Enough evidence, according to Twitter! She could just be bloated, people. Ease up! Though if she IS, congratulations! We'll be here, ready to dissect the baby names and predict the child's future Bollywood debut.
normalised: And last but not least, speculation is RIFE about whether Alia Bhatt is pregnant again. A slightly looser kurta at a recent film screening? Enough evidence, according to Twitter! She could just be bloated, people. Ease up! Though if she IS, congratulations! We'll be here, ready to dissect the baby names and predict the child's future Bollywood debut.

unnormalised: That's all the masala for this week, folks! Remember to take everything with a pinch of salt (and maybe a side of gulab jamun). Until next time, keep your ears open and your judgments… well, let's just say keep them coming! Shanti!
normalised: That's all the masala for this week, folks! Remember to take everything with a pinch of salt (and maybe a side of gulab jamun). Until next time, keep your ears open and your judgments… well, let's just say keep them coming! Shanti!
